DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate effectiveness method Proprioceptive Neuromuscular Facilitation ( PNF ) physical therapy approach reduction pain improvement functional performance quality life woman knee osteoarthritis .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Proprioceptive Neuromuscular Facilitation Older Women With Gonarthrosis
DOC.detailed_description: Patients divide two group : group perform proprioceptive neuromuscular facilitation group submit perform resistance exercise .
DOC.criteria: Women ; Age 60 80 year ; Clinical diagnosis Osteoarthritis knee ; Patients presence least 90 ° range motion knee flexion ; Independent ambulation without use auxiliary device march ; Do practitioner physical exercise physical therapy period participation survey Diagnosis rheumatological neurological disease ; orthopedic surgery History low limb ; Individuals muscle strength low limb < 3 ; Cognitive impairment neurological disease compromise understand implementation Protocol ( Mini Mental State Examination < 18 illiterate < 24 others ) ; Body mass index ≥ 30.0 ( obesity , accord World Health Organization ) . Individuals classify physical activity level `` active '' IPAQ ( International Physical Activity Questionnaire ) .
